title: Thresh Skin

embed.description: My suggestion for an "Fisherman Thresh" skin (League of Legends Champion) Fisherman Thresh

body:
I feel as if  Thresh should get a funny type of skin.
And I also feel like it should be Fisherman Thresh
Make sure to give some feedback if you agree.
{{champion:412}}

replies.body: It'd probably be hard to pull off the look while still making it feel like Thresh but I like the idea :D
I gotta say, this idea has got me **Hooked** {{champion:412}}

http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2013/294/3/f/phreak___tons_of_damage_on_the_dance_floor_by_jordanlolqwerty-d6rcc4v.gif

I like you. I like the way you think
Now we will get Deep Sea Terror Kalista and Fisherman Kalista, because they basically share the same wardrobe
spear fishing lololol

I like the concept of this skin, but I also want to point out some of the ridiculousness of this image.

Thresh catching an angler fish in a shallow river is bizarre, and the look on that worm's face is priceless.
I love the idea, but I doubt Riot will ever do it, mainly because Thresh already has a "ocean-themed" skin (that being Deep Terror Thresh). Cool idea though :){{item:1051}}
Preferd an Ice Holidays Thresh
May be go for a fish bones look, all deep sea fish and bones? and have it so he collects little floating fish maybe? that way when he does the soul eating taunt he is eating little fish?

> [{quoted}](name=DawnsGate,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WKfqQzGm,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-05T05:28:56.618+0000)
>
> May be go for a fish bones look, all deep sea fish and bones? and have it so he collects little floating fish maybe? that way when he does the soul eating taunt he is eating little fish?

There is already a underwater type skin for thresh

> [{quoted}](name=PapishHawk,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WKfqQzGm,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-09-06T04:35:25.469+0000)
>
> There is already a underwater type skin for thresh

This isn't an underwater skin though homey - its above water! But yes certainly relatable to bodies of water but on the other side of Deep Terror Thresh!

Personally I kinda like having a mix of "serious" (i.e. "we gotta bad ass over here") and some more light hearted ones (love the Space Teemo/Naut skins - mafia Jinx - bunny Riven etc) I think Thresh needs one that doesn't take itself too seriously and this could be a start!
Wow, you're reading my mind mate. :D The only difference is that I thought of Thresh with yellow raincoat and lobster-cage instead of lantern. But this seems lotta fun too!
His lantern could be a tackle box maybe?
i would think his ulti of a lobster cage too
CLICK ON THE FISH! NOW!
deep sea thresh is a thing
But it's not as fun.
Why-Why is this not already a thing?
Love the angler.

there should be a special interaction when thresh hooks someone who is currently being ulted by fizz. like if he hooks them before the fish eats them, the fish gets reeled back to thresh instead of going back in the ground.
He's already got deep sea terror or whatever, I think that'll be milking the hook idea. Possibly rancher Thresh? Complete with lasso and all.
